title: purge
description: Purge a number of messages from the channel you're in.
---

Purge a number of messages from the channel you're in.

## Usage

```sh
;purge <number of messages>
```

## Examples

```sh
# purge 10 messages in the channel you're in
;purge 10
```

## Required Permissions


:::note
Learn more about permissions in [Discord's FAQ](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206029707-Setting-Up-Permissions-FAQ).
:::

- Manage Messages
